short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

full_summary:
### Title: Replenishment of Electrical Equipment and Components

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the replenishment of various electrical equipment and components, as outlined below.

#### Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: W8482-241731/A
* Reference Number: cb-9074-96020856
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: September 14, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 16, 2023, at 14:00 (ET)
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
* Tender Status: Expiring
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* UNSPSC: 39120000 (Electrical equipment and components and supplies)

#### Goods and Services Requirements

The Department of National Defence requires various electrical equipment and components for delivery to Canadian Forces Bases Halifax and Esquimalt. The items required include:

| Item # | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Connector, Receptacle, Electrical | 51 EA | EA | Halifax, NS |
| 2 | Connector, Receptacle, Electrical | 61 EA | EA | Esquimalt, BC |
| 3 | Connector, Receptacle, Electrical | 56 EA | EA | Halifax, NS |
| 4 | Connector, Receptacle, Electrical | 53 EA | EA | Esquimalt, BC |
| 5 | Connector, Plug, Electrical | 1 EA | EA | Halifax, NS |
| 6 | Connector, Plug, Electrical | 2 EA | EA | Esquimalt, BC |

#### Submission Guidelines
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars; foreign currency bids will not be considered.
* Bidders must submit equivalent or substitute products with brand name, model, and/or part number, along with NCAGE.

#### Preference
* Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.

#### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Johan Vizcaya Collado
* Email: johan.vizcaya.collado@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (555) 555-5555
* Attachment: Please find the tender package at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/t
